extendedInfo.description: Have you dreamt about a beautiful body? If u have this is it. With our app and your hard work you can have a beautiful body that you have dreamt of. FITNESS GURU brings you 50+ exercises to tune up your body and make it look beautiful. In this app there are various types of exercises ranging from easy to hard and there are 2D animations to help you out in doing this exercises (this 2D animations will only work on android version 2.2 or higher) These exercises are suggested by trained professionals so download this app, go through it and begin your work out.And last but not the least this app is for free. YES! You can download this app for free and begin your work out .One more thing folks do not forget to rate our app out of 5 if you like it as it would be help full for our future endeavors.
